info.title: Specification for corectl
info.description: corectl contains various commands to interact with the Qlik Associative Engine. See respective command for more information

app.description: App name, if no app is specified a session app is used instead.

bash.description: Bash flag used to adapt output to bash completion format

config.description: path/to/config.yml where parameters can be set instead of on the command line

engine.description: URL to the Qlik Associative Engine

headers.description: Http headers to use when connecting to Qlik Associative Engine

traffic.description: Log JSON websocket traffic to stdout

ttl.description: Qlik Associative Engine session time to live in seconds

build.short: Reloads and saves the app after updating connections, dimensions, measures, objects and the script

connections.description: path/to/connections.yml that contains connections that are used in the reload. Note that when specifying connections in the config file they are specified inline, not as a file reference!

dimensions.description: A list of generic dimension json paths

measures.description: A list of generic measures json paths

objects.description: A list of generic object json paths

script.description: path/to/reload-script.qvs that contains a qlik reload script. If omitted the last specified reload script for the current app is reloaded

catwalk.short: Opens the specified app in catwalk
catwalk.description: Opens the specified app in catwalk. If no app is specified the catwalk hub will be opened.

catwalk-url.description: Url to an instance of catwalk, if not provided the qlik one will be used.

completion.description:
Generates a shell completion script for the specified shell (bash or zsh). The shell script must be evaluated to provide
interactive completion. This can be done by sourcing it in your ~/.bashrc or ~/.zshrc file. 
Note that bash-completion is required and needs to be installed on your system.

eval.short: Evaluates a list of measures and dimensions
eval.description: Evaluates a list of measures and dimensions. To evaluate a measure for a specific dimension use the <measure> by <dimension> notation. If dimensions are omitted then the eval will be evaluated over all dimensions.

generate-docs.short: Generate markdown docs based on cobra commands
generate-docs.description: Generate markdown docs based on cobra commands

generate-spec.short: Generate API spec based on cobra commands
generate-spec.description: Generate API spec docs based on cobra commands

apps.short: Prints a list of all apps available in the current engine
apps.description: Prints a list of all apps available in the current engine

json.description: Prints the information in json format

connection.short: Shows the properties for a specific connection
connection.description: Shows the properties for a specific connection

connections.short: Prints a list of all connections in the specified app
connections.description: Prints a list of all connections in the specified app

json.description: Prints the information in json format

dimension.short: Shows content of an generic dimension
dimension.description: Shows content of an generic dimension. If no subcommand is specified the properties will be shown.

layout.short: Evaluates the layout of an generic dimension
layout.description: Evaluates the layout of an generic dimension

properties.short: Prints the properties of the generic dimension
properties.description: Prints the properties of the generic dimension

dimensions.short: Prints a list of all generic dimensions in the current app
dimensions.description: Prints a list of all generic dimensions in the current app

json.description: Prints the information in json format

field.description: Prints all the values for a specific field in your data model

fields.description: Prints all the fields in an app, and for each field also some sample content, tags and and number of values

keys.description: Prints a fields list containing key-only fields

measure.short: Shows content of an generic measure
measure.description: Shows content of an generic measure. If no subcommand is specified the properties will be shown.

layout.short: Evaluates the layout of an generic measure
layout.description: Evaluates the layout of an generic measure and prints in JSON format

properties.short: Prints the properties of the generic measure
properties.description: Prints the properties of the generic measure in JSON format

measures.short: Prints a list of all generic measures in the current app
measures.description: Prints a list of all generic measures in the current app in either plain text or json

json.description: Prints the information in json format

meta.description: Lists tables, fields, associations along with metadata like memory consumption, field cardinality etc

object.short: Shows content of an generic object
object.description: Shows content of an generic object. If no subcommand is specified the properties will be shown.

data.short: Evaluates the hypercube data of an generic object
data.description: Evaluates the hypercube data of an generic object

layout.short: Evaluates the hypercube layout of an generic object
layout.description: Evaluates the hypercube layout of an generic object in JSON format

properties.short: Prints the properties of the generic object
properties.description: Prints the properties of the generic object in JSON format

objects.short: Prints a list of all generic objects in the current app
objects.description: Prints a list of all generic objects in the current app in either plain text or JSON format

json.description: Prints the information in json format

script.description: Fetches the script currently set in the app and prints it in plain text.

status.short: Prints status info about the connection to the engine and current app
status.description: Prints status info about the connection to the engine and current app, and also the status of the data model

tables.description: Prints tables summary for the data model in an app

help.description:
Help provides help for any command in the application.
Simply type corectl help [path to command] for full details.

remove.short: Remove entities (connections, dimensions, measures, objects) in the app or the app itself
remove.description: Remove one or mores generic entities (connections, dimensions, measures, objects) in the app

connections.description: Removes one or many connections from the app

dimensions.short: Removes the specified generic dimensions in the current app
dimensions.description: Removes the specified generic dimensions in the current app

measures.short: Removes the specified generic measures in the current app
measures.description: Removes the specified generic measures in the current app

objects.short: Removes the specified generic objects in the current app
objects.description: Removes the specified generic objects in the current app

all.short: Sets the objects, measures, dimensions, connections and script in the current app
all.description: Sets the objects, measures, dimensions, connections and script in the current app

connections.description: path/to/connections.yml that contains connections that are used in the reload. Note that when specifying connections in the config file they are specified inline, not as a file reference!

dimensions.description: A list of generic dimension json paths

measures.description: A list of generic measures json paths

objects.description: A list of generic object json paths

script.description: path/to/reload-script.qvs that contains a qlik reload script. If omitted the last specified reload script for the current app is reloaded

connections.short: Sets or updates the connections in the current app
connections.description: Sets or updates the connections in the current app
path/to/connections.yml that contains connections that are used in the reload. Note that when specifying connections in the config file they are specified inline, not as a file reference!

dimensions.short: Sets or updates the dimensions in the current app
dimensions.description: Sets or updates the dimensions in the current app

measures.short: Sets or updates the measures in the current app
measures.description: Sets or updates the measures in the current app

objects.short: Sets or updates the objects in the current app
objects.description:
Sets or updates the objects in the current app.
The JSON objects can be in either the GenericObjectProperties format or the GenericObjectEntry format

script.short: Sets the script in the current app
script.description: Sets the script in the current app
